#summary jQuery Editable Combobox changelog v1.0.0RC.
= 1.0.0RC1 (2009.05.01) =
 * documentation updated and navigation improved
 * plugin function renamed to {{{jec}}} (previous name {{{editableCombobox}}} can be still used but this name is considered deprecated) ([http://code.google.com/p/jquery-jec/issues/detail?id=12&can=1 #12])
 * added method for disabling editable comboboxes ({{{jecOff}}}) ([http://code.google.com/p/jquery-jec/issues/detail?id=16&can=1 #16])
 * added method for getting and setting editable option's values ({{{jecValue}}}) ([http://code.google.com/p/jquery-jec/issues/detail?id=11&can=1 #11])
 * unit tests added
